course_description: This course will introduce and identify a variety of formal and conceptual possibilities within the genre of New Media. Students will create art using sound art, 3-D digital space-making, and video projection.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3337, Section #: 1, Type: ART, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-4:30p, Instructor: J. Foley, Status: Closed
